description: Try our easy to follow Hearty Broc-Cauli & Barley Salad recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Salads,Pescatarian,Halal,Seafood free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Egg free,Vegan,Sesame free,Cauliflower,Dairy free
name: Hearty BrocCauli & Barley Salad Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Cook barley following packet directions. When tender, add currants. Stand for 5 minutes to soften. Drain and cool.
Steam broccoli and cauliflower for 6 minutes until just tender. Refresh in cold water and drain well.
Combine barley, currants, almonds, parsley and onion in a serving bowl. Whisk oil and lemon juice together and season. Stir through barley mixture. Add broccoli and cauliflower. Toss well. Serve.
